title: Happy Birthday, Elichi!
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>E~lichi! I’m here to pick you up~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Nozomi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You’re almost done with student council work, right? Everyone is here already, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yes, thank you. With that said, it’s become a custom for everyone to gather, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>The more the merrier, no?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, that’s true. So, did you win the rock paper scissors to be the one to pick me up, Nozomi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I…. came here before the rock paper scissors. I can’t possibly let go of being the first one to congratulate you, Elichi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Playing unfair, aren’t you? Even though you’re their senior<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It’s exactly at times like these that we should use our senior authority. Hey, Elichi, happy birthday. From the bottom of my heart, I pray that you have a wonderful everyday, Elichi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>My, just praying? Let’s spend those wonderful everyday together<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, you’re right. I’ll never let you go, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
